actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to establish the Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge.
short_title: Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act

summary.text: Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act - Establishes the Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge, Minnesota. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to construct within such refuge a wildlife interpretation and education center. Requires the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and the Corps of Engineers to assist local authorities in designating sites for deposit of spoil material so as to minimize the disruption of wildlife and scenic values within the refuge.

titles.title: Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge Act
A bill to establish the Minnesota River Valley National Wildlife Refuge.
